mapper.insert: insert into member values(SEQ_MEMID.nextval, #{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{memName}, #{memPostcode}, #{memBasicAddr}, #{memDetailAddr}, #{memPhone}, #{memNickname}, #{memEmail}, 0, sysdate, default, #{memLoginType})
mapper.select: select * from member where mem_id = #{memId} and mem_status = 'Y'
select count(*) from member where mem_id = #{memId} and mem_status = 'Y'
select count(*) from member where mem_phone = #{memPhone} and mem_status = 'Y' and mem_login_type = 'B'
select count(*) from member where mem_nickname = #{nickname} and mem_status = 'Y'
select count(*) from member where mem_email = #{email} and mem_status = 'Y'
select count(*) from member where mem_id = #{memId} and mem_email = #{memEmail} and mem_status = 'Y' and mem_login_type = 'B'
select count(*) from member where mem_id = #{memId} and mem_phone = #{memPhone} and mem_status = 'Y' and mem_login_type = 'B'
select mem_id from member where mem_Name = #{memName} and mem_phone = #{memPhone} and mem_status = 'Y' and mem_login_type = 'B'
